description:
Even if your rear derailleur has a clutch, the chunderiest trails will make your chain do the wave. RideWrap’s chainstay armour protects your bike from chain-slap and it looks better than electrical tap, or an old tube.

  • Impact absorbing thick polymer tape
  • Easy to apply at home – trimming will be required
  • Includes 1 roll (5 x 100cm) and 1 cleaning wipe
name: RideWrap Chainstay Armor
